name: Jambalam
description:
Arrows to move, space to fire --- O to lower volume, P to raise it (why would you?)

Kind of a thing I mostly just threw together. I had high hopes for this weekend but never did find the time, oh well!

You're a shotgun who is running from their past, you don't want to kill anymore. The ghosts of the countless frogs you've mowed down haunt you.

"coding" by me, frog sprite by tom
